definition: suffix of a noun of locality
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: Twenty years on, only a few remnants of the barrier remain.
sentences.chinese: 二十年以後，只剩下邊卡的一部分還存在。

sentences.english: By adopting the customized edge clamp, the multi-purpose infusion holder can be optionally fixed on the place around the sick bed.
sentences.chinese: 利用特製邊卡還可將架隨意固定在病牀的四周位置。
